issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink
2. Run Platform > XHR > File Download
3. Click on Large File Download
4. See the progress bar run and then click abort
5. Wait and error will display

Actual Result:
Runtime Error: Attempted read on closed stream

Expected Result:
abort download without runtime error

Tested on:
Nexus S 2.3.2 Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (Apr 12 2011 15:24 rcc9dd9e1)

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Aborting large download causes runtime error
